idea:
A beauty only discovery, interaction, and shopping platform for beauty enthusiasts. An influencer management and sales driving tool linked to a consumer app, for online beauty marketplaces.


Glossit fills the void of a online destination that combines the exploration, decision-making & shopping journey around beauty products

- Find & discover beauty products through trusted beauty influencers and professionals’ images and video content

- No more hunting online to buy products you see in content! View tagged beauty products with all details and links to buy immediately

- Digitally consult with favourite influencers & beauty professionals via queries, chats, and video sessions


Simultaneously, the platform enables beauty marketplaces to regularly access new and upcoming micro and nano beauty-influencers (the money makers), manage existing influencers, projects & payments in one place.
name: Glossit

idea:
VRAJ INDUSTRIES

AN ISO 9001 : 2008 COMPANY

2/Mit Industrial estate, Chinch Pada, Vasai East, Palghar 401208.

Mr. Kirit- +91 9820077633 / 93245 77633. Off. : 022 26786032

E-mail: kirit@vrajindustries.net,kiritnasit@gmail.com website: www.vrajindustries.net

INTRODUCTION:

We are providing complete solution for Engineering Industries Experience of more then15 years and 3000+ development of Moulds, Dies for precisions parts of rubber and plastics (Pvdf, Pu, Pvc, Abs, delrin, nylon, pc, pet, pp,taflon, ps, silicon, nitren and many more.), This is use in differential industries like aero space, Auto mobile, Mining, oil and Gas, Textile, Medical, Surgical, Agricultural, Mechanical, Household, Toys and Games, Furniture, Pharmaceutical, Electronics, Engineering and many more.

Apart of this our sister concern are Autodesk and SIEMENS Solution Partner for CAD CAM CAE expert Software Sales and Training. Also we use same for our Manufacturing Setup.

MACHINERY WITH TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION :

1) Vertical Machining Center (Deckel Make 104V Linear) with

Automatic tool changer, 12000 rpm, ‘X’ axis travel - 1050mm, ‘Y’

axis travel - 600mm, ‘Z’ axis travel - 600mm

2) vertical machining center (JYOTI make Vmc-640 model) with

automatic arm type tool changer, 8000 rpm, ‘X’ axis travel – 640mm,

‘Y’ axis travel – 405mm, ‘Z’ axis travel – 500mm

3) Conventional milling with taping and drilling attachment size 80 dia

facing, 25mm taping and 32mm drilling capacity.

4) Conventional Drilling machine capacity of drill 32mm, tappping 16mm.

5) Radial Drilling Machine capacity of 50mm drill and 20mm tapping.

6) Conventional Lathe between center 6feet and turn over dia 24inch.

7) Conventional Lathe between center 5feet and turn over dia 20inch.

8) Surface Grinding Machine 12inch x 32inch

9) Pillor type drilling Machine capacity of 25mm and 16mm tapping.

10) 3D Printer for RPT 240 x 150 x150mm.

11) Pillor type drilling Machine capacity of 16mm and 12mm tapping.

INSTRUMENT LIST:

TOOL PRE SETTER (check height & diameter of tool to set accurately

for accurate sized job out put upon cnc machine.)

0.02mm to 1000mm all size of vernier caliper make of Mitutoyo.

0.01mm to 250mm all size of micro meter make of Mitutoyo.

6mm to 200mm all set of bore gauges make of Mitutoyo.

Slip gauges set 83pcs from 0.5mm to 150mm make of links.

0.02mm to 500mm Height gauges sets.

Combination set, bevel gauge, surface plate 400mm x 400mm

Feeler gauges, thread gauges, precisions magnetic v blocks etc.

Projects

Mould and die manufacturing.

Precisions plastic and Rubber products design and Development.

Jigs and Fixture Manufacturing.

Designing of Moulds, Dies, Jigs, Fixtures and Engineering component.
